summary: The module provides a collection of unit tests that validate AWS Simple Email Service (SES) v2 client functionality using the Moto library to mock AWS services. It exercises operations such as creating, retrieving, listing, and deleting contact lists and contacts, as well as sending different types of emails (plain, HTML, raw) through the mocked SES endpoint.
business_intent: Ensure that code interacting with SES v2 behaves correctly, handling contact management and email transmission without requiring real AWS resources, thereby supporting reliable development and continuous integration.
